title: Projects
paragraph: Welcome to the projects section of my portfolio. Here you'll find a selection of my most recent work as a junior frontend developer, showcasing my skills in Vue.js, Nuxt.js, TypeScript, and Sass. Each project reflects my commitment to creating fast, scalable web interfaces with an appealing design. I hope it inspires you, and I look forward to collaborating soon!

image.alt: Mockup of a web application that suggests recipes with AI

description.text: Con lo que hay is a web application that generates personalized recipes using artificial intelligence, based on the ingredients available at home.
The application does not require registration: users simply select their allergies and the foods they want to include or avoid, ensuring a quick and accessible experience.
It also features a free text field where users can add instructions or preferences, allowing the AI to propose creative and tailored recipe combinations.
Vibe Live is a real-time streaming platform inspired by Twitch, created with Nuxt.js, Vue.js, and TypeScript. It uses the official Twitch API to authenticate users, display channel and stream data.
Users can enjoy a complete streaming experience with live broadcast viewing and real-time chat.
The project is deployed on Vercel and is optimized for both desktop and mobile devices.
